Files & Folders

Finding Files in Folders

Home

You are now going to find some files within the folder structure. In the next three tasks, you'll be asked to navigate through the folders until you have found the correct file. You'll be given the name of a file, its file type, and the folder or folders it can be found in. A recap of file types is shown below, move your mouse over them to confirm what they are.

When you are ready, click next. Once you've found the file, select it to confirm (click on it once).
